meaningMnemonic: Where the <kanji>stream</kanji> is <kanji>go</kanji>ing is where everyone's going. That's what tends to be the <vocabulary>trend</vocabulary> of things. Imagine a trend going on in your society right now. Imagine it going down a stream with everyone following it. This word is also used for less desirable trends, like the <vocabulary>prevalence</vocabulary> of infectious diseases.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
